name: NEW KRYPTO KICKS - Series 01, #12 - "The Raaar" by Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool) and Felicity Echo Hanson (Toddler Terror)
description: [Mixed media with digital embellishments and color.] My granddaughter called monsters "raaars" for a while. We thought it was funny. Now, of course, she's much older (almost 2 and a half), so she just calls them monsters, now, which is not as funny. However, because I've made an immutable NFT of her linguistic anomaly, the fact that someone used that sound in that way will now be preserved as long as there is a blockchain and a method for reading it...and electricity. ---Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool) and Felicity Echo Hanson (Toddler Terror)
